topic.title: Make art great again
topic.body: Sick of all those pathetic splotches, terrible music and how so many artists both musical and visual have to sign up with a company just to get anywhere? How can we prevent this from happening? These artists deserve more for their work and some I absolutely love but was disbanded cause no record company wanted them.

1585525602_1DoVPxFrQCDb3grC8Nsn6aACed9o2.body: Funny how we're not told when.
